Ratchet and Bluestreak are also firing at Savage, Minime.

::Striker::

One of the fireballs hits Striker in the chest, sending him flying backwards, 
his chest charred and partly melted. The other two go over his head. Striker 
growls, returning fire with his shoulder blasters.
